scripts.dev: npm run kill-port && npm run dev:classic
scripts.dev:classic: PORT=8080 tsx server/server-classic.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.dev:colyseus: PORT=8080 tsx server/server-colyseus.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.dev:socketio: PORT=8080 tsx server/server-socketio.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.start: npm run kill-port && npm run start:classic
scripts.start:classic: NODE_ENV=production tsx server/server-classic.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.start:colyseus: NODE_ENV=production tsx server/server-colyseus.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.start:socketio: NODE_ENV=production tsx server/server-socketio.ts & sleep 3 && open http://localhost:8080
